body_text: I don't love how this works - feels a little hacky to print stuff on the page and then grub it inside JS to transfer data - but I can't immediately think of a better solution, so ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
body: I don't _love_ how this works - feels a little hacky to print stuff on the page and then grub it inside JS to transfer data - but I can't immediately think of a better solution, so ¯\\\_(ツ)\_/¯
